Introduction

ROMEO (Korean: 로미오; Japanese: ロミオ) is a six-member boy group managed by Hunus Entertainment. They made their official debut in May 2015 with the mini album "The Romeo."

On January 21, 2023, it was confirmed that ROMEO (with four members: Seunghwan, Kyle, Hyunkyung and Kangmin) will partake in JBTC's Peak Time. Their silhouette was revealed through a performance of "Juliette" by SHINee.Unfortunately, they were eliminated in the second episode.

They referred to themselves as former Romeo members, thus confirming that the group had disbanded. Their social media has been inactive since 2018 and 2019.
